body:
Donald Trump says Heidi Klum is no longer a “10” — and the undaunted supermodel hit back Monday with this sexy video.
Trump, discussing his attitude toward women, told The New York Times over the weekend, “Heidi Klum — sadly, she’s no longer a 10.”
Klum responded by posting the video for her 3.2 million Twitter followers.
In the 12-second clip, the 42-year-old mother of four is seen being photographed for a fashion shoot, wearing a white T-shirt that says “10.”
Suddenly, a man wearing a paper Trump mask rips off the “10,” revealing the numbers “9.99.”
Klum gasps, then looks down at the new numbers, shrugs it off and smiles.
The video closes with the hashtag #HeidiTrumpsTrump.
Trump has been under fire for his comments on women.
In the Times article in which he assessed Klum, Trump admitted, “Sometimes I do go a little bit far.”
Click here for more from the New York Post's Page Six.





#TrumpHasSpoken #sadly #9.99 #NoLongerA10 #IHadAGoodRun #donaldtrump #trumped #HeidiTrumpsTrump #BeautyIsInTheEyeOfTheBeheld
A video posted by Heidi Klum (@heidiklum) on Aug 17, 2015 at 11:35am PDT
description: Donald Trump says Heidi Klum is no longer a “10” — and the undaunted supermodel hit back Monday with this sexy video.
title: Heidi Klum posts sexy video after Donald Trump's comments
